resources.string: Accelerometer sensitivity can not be 0 or less than 0
Sensitivity can be changed in accelerometer settings

The start sensitivity is the minimum movement which will be considered a reaction. If TrackStarter isn\'t detecting your reaction, lower the sensitivity. If the app is detecting false starts which aren\'t false because it detects minor movements, increase the sensitivity. The default value is 1.

The false start sensitivity is the minimum movement which will be considered a reaction, if its detected between the SET and GO sound. It is higher than the start sensitivity so that moving into SET position wont be mistaken as a false start. The default value is 5.

The time calibration is an adjustment users can make if the reaction time is too high or too low. Increasing the value from 0 to 100 will add 0.100 to your reaction. Decreasing value from 0 to -100 will bring down the reaction by 0.100. Default is 0ms.
It is not recommended to change sound 3 as the reaction time will lose accuracy, continue?

Touch START to start. If you are doing block starts and want to get your reaction time, place the phone in contact with the blocks (behind the back block for example). If you are doing standing starts you can place the phone in your hand or any part of your body which will move when you react. To change the sounds for ON YOUR MARKS, SET and GO go to Sounds settings. To change the timing between the sounds go to Timing settings. If you want to change the accelerometer\'s sensitivity or calibrate the reaction time go to Accelerometer settings.
If you encounter any issues, you can contact pablo.trescoli@gmail.com
Name must be more than 1 and less than 15 characters long
Times should be more than 0 and less than 40 seconds
The actual time between the SET and GO sounds will be +-10% of the configured value
Times resetted. Remember to save first
Time 1 is the time interval between pressing the START button, and hearing the ON YOUR MARKS sound
Time 2 is the time interval between hearing the ON YOUR MARKS sound, and the SET sound
Choose the minimum and maximum time between SET and GO, a random value will be assigned in every start
Change the sound you want to hear for ON YOUR MARKS, SET and GO
This file can not be deleted
